title: Global Day of Coderetreat Vienna 2023
description: A Coderetreat is all about crafting software. Join our community event to practice professional software development, spend a day on deliberate learning and practice, and have fun. This year will focus on different TDD styles (test-first development). We invite everyone interested in software development, whether beginners or seasoned professionals, to participate in this year's Global Day of Coderetreat. Arrival is from 08:15 onwards. Join us for breakfast, if you'd like. We provide beverages and some snacks. The sessions start at 09:00. Looking forward to seeing you soon!
